snippet: A Human Rights Watch video report makes a compelling case that Syrian rebels executed civilians, including women and the disabled, during a raid in August on the heartland of President Bashar al-Assad’s ruling Alawite sect.
abstract: A Human Rights Watch video report makes a compelling case that Syrian rebels executed civilians, including women and the disabled, during a raid in August on the heartland of President Bashar al-Assad’s ruling Alawite sect.

headline.main: Video Report Bolsters Claims of Summary Executions of Civilians by Syrian Rebels
